mapper.select: SELECT count(file_id) FROM file_info WHERE file_create_time >= #{date1} and file_create_time <= #{date2}
SELECT count(file_id) FROM file_info WHERE file_user_id = #{userId}
select count(fork_id) from fork_info where doc_id in (select doc_id from doc_info where doc_user_id = #{userId})
SELECT count(file_id) FROM file_info WHERE file_user_id = #{userId} or file_state = 5
select c.*, count(c.file_id) 'fileClickTimes' ,f.file_name 'fileName' from click_info c join file_info f on c.file_id = f.file_id GROUP BY c.file_id ORDER BY fileClickTimes DESC LIMIT 7;

select count(file.file_id) 'uploadFileTimes', classification_id 'classId',classification_name 'className' from file_info file join classification cl on cl.classification_id = file.file_class_id where file.file_create_time >#{time} group by cl.classification_id ORDER BY uploadFileTimes DESC
